text: @SenSchumer First you @SenSchumer said last week to just give more in unemployment & direct payments than your party refuses to release aid to Americans unless you get climate change & a bunch of things that has nothing to do with #COVID19 ! Stop holding our aid hostage!! #signthebillnow https://t.co/M90q9F4xr5

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
